elements.text:
You are invited to a Halloween party with your coworkers and you're only close to a couple of people there. You decide to wear a costume. When you arrive, everyone looks at you. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I worry about what others are thinking, but realize that I'm allowed to wear what makes me happy.
I'm worried that others are making fun of me behind my back.
I feel so liberated wearing something so fun.
I'm really embarrassed that I stand out so much, but honestly people will forget about it in a few minutes.
I feel happy wearing what I love.
